description: A monitoring dashboard which gives an overall overview of the host system and the docker containers running on it.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stream"] == "stdout" or r["stream"] == "stderr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_image"] =~ /\w*odoo\w*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "production")
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["stream"] == "stdout" or r["stream"] == "stderr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "message")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_image"] =~ /\w*db\w*/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "production")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_running")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Percentage of the Root filesystem used.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0 + 100.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_paused")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_containers_stopped")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0 + 100.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used" or r._field == "cached" or r._field == "free" or r._field == "buffered" or r._field == "shared")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system" and (r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load5" or r["_field"] == "load15"))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: r._value,
    _field:
      if r._field == "load1" then "1 min. load"
      else if r._field == "load5" then "5 min. load"
      else if r._field == "load15" then "15 min. load"
      else r._field
  }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_iowait")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "free")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement","path"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: r._value,
    _field:
      if r._field == "bytes_recv" then "Bytes Recv."
      else if r._field == "bytes_sent" then "Bytes Sent"
      else r._field
  }))
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "dns_query")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "query_time_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] =~ /${container:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] =~ /${container:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_blkio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "io_service_bytes_recursive_read")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] =~ /${container:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_blkio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "io_service_bytes_recursive_write")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] =~ /${container:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] =~ /${container:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tx_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] =~ /${container:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["container_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: Device
list.name: device
list.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["host"])
  |> distinct(column: "host")

list.name: container

from(bucket: "${bucket}")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${device}")

title: Overall Monitoring Dashboard
